original_title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ slayed summer. Here’s what you need to know about them | CNN
article_summary: "Netflix's 'KPop Demon Hunters' is poised to become the platform's most-watched original film, blending K-pop and supernatural themes. The animated musical features real-life stars and has produced Top 10 hits on the Billboard chart, revitalizing interest in movie soundtracks."</s>
